desc: In a world where our waste is growing exponentially the need to be more and more environmentally conscience is here. My sustainable fashion began as an idea to take old unwanted clothing and make it into a new stylish piece of fashion! My cutting and creating is evolving into a fun upcycled wearable art business.

layout.text:
the need to be environmentally conscience is here
each piece is mindfully produced by me
wearing my circular fashion will turn heads,
spur imagination + your heart, while being green
see where I will be under marketplace!
